mainText.attr1: Rally points are positions/objects that built ships go to when they first launch.
Setup rally points to easily manage your fleet.
Select a shipyard (either a base or an shipyard platform)
Right click on empty space to set that point as a rally point for ships.
Right click on a friendly ship to set that ship as a rally ship.
Can be moved - just like place holder and nav objects can be moved.
Left click, hold and drag to move. Hold the CTRL key to move up and down.
Select a shipyard (either a base or an shipyard platform)
If this is a non ship rally point - right click on it to remove it.
If this is a a ship rally point - right on another ship, or empty space to designate a new rally point.
